import React from 'react' import defaultimg from "./default.jpg" const NewsItems = (props) => { let { title, description, imgurl, url, author, time, source } = props; return (
{source}
{title}

{description}

Last Updated on {new Date(time).toGMTString()}

By {author ? author : "Unknown"}

Read More
) } export default NewsItems
